title: Vietnam Veterans Memorial: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Memorial Day, Vietnam Veterans Memorial NPS / Nathan King  Located north of the Lincoln Memorial near the intersection of 22nd St. and Constitution Ave. NW, Vietnam Veterans Memorial is free to visit and is open 24 hours a day.   The memorial includes the names of over 58,000 servicemen and women who gave their lives in service in the Vietnam Conflict.  The memorial also includes "The Three Servicemen" statue and the Vietnam Women's Memorial.     Directions Operating Hours and Seasons Things to Do
